short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get an instant vehicle history report on any website where there is a VIN. Share your report with friends and family.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Car Simulcast VIN Report for Chrome is your fast resource for researching new or used cars and trucks across websites like Carfax, Craigslist, Autotrader, and more. It even works on social media platforms like Facebook or Instagram. Simply browse through any website where there is a VIN number and you will see the "VIN Report" option next to the VIN. Click it to get an instant vehicle history report detailing accident, damage and service information.
